core.delete_caution: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
core.delete_all_caution: Are you sure you want to delete all entries?
core.clear_all_caution: Are you sure you want to clear all?
core.allow_password_tips: Letters (case sensitive), numbers and symbols $$$$ are allowed
core.security_password_tips: At least two of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols are required
core.use_weak_tips: Weak passwords are easily guessable and also expose your network to potential brute-force attacks.
core.begin_not_allow_tips: Cannot start with any of the characters {char}
core.name: Name
core.incorrect_formate_tips: Incorrect formatting, please change manually or {action}

msg.access_denied: Invalid user, permission denied or not logged in!
msg.operation_not_finished: Please wait until the current operation has finished.
msg.unknown_err: Unknown error occurred. Please check the network environment or reboot the device.
msg.interface_timeout: Operation timed out. Please check the network environment or reboot the device.
msg.lack_of_memory_tips: Due to lack of memory, if you want to upgrade the firmware, you can try to reboot the device.

internet.lan_ip_tips: LAN subnet is in conflict with the WAN subnet, Please $$$$Change LAN Subnet$$$$ to a different address.
internet.guest_ip_tips: Guest subnet is in conflict with the WAN subnet, Please $$$$Change Guest Subnet$$$$ to a different address.
internet.up_not_online_tips: The interface is connected, but the Internet can't be accessed with $$$$ protocol.
internet.offline_tips: The interface is connected, but the Internet can't be accessed.
internet.ttl_tips: TTL (Time To Live) sets the maximum time for packets to survive in the network, and is filled in according to the requirements of the operator.
internet.hl_tips: In IPv6, the HL (Hop Limit) field is used to limit the number of transmission hops of data packets in the network, which is equivalent to the TTL in IPv4.
internet.mac_format_tips: the least significant bit of the first octet is not allowed set to 1 (i.e. the second hexadecimal digit is not allowed odd).
internet.mtu_general_tips: If you set a value higher/lower than the supported range of the device, the device uses the supported maximum/minimum value.
internet.mtu_ipv6_warning_tips: IPv6 cannot work when MTU is lower than 1280.
internet.illegal_subnet_tips: Illegal subnets, the last three bits must be 0.
internet.illegal_subnet_mask_tips: Illegal mask, since the subnet is {subnet}, the mask cannot be less than {min}.
internet.auto_update_mac_tips: If this option is enabled, the MAC can update automatically.
internet.mac_replacement_tips: The MAC can update at the update time point, and if the MAC is still in use at this time, it will update after the next time you reconnect to the network.

upload.select_or_drag: Select a file to upload or drag it here
upload.too_large_tips: The uploaded file is too big, please upload a file that is less than $$$$ bytes.

system.battery_err_tips: The system does not detect the battery module, check the power connection or battery for damage.
system.feature_unusable_tips: This feature does not work because {feature} is enabled.
system.no_internet_base_tips: Please check your internet environment and try again.

subscription.url_err_tips: Please enter the correct URL link.

vaildate.only_allowd_input_tips: Only {limit} is allowed to be entered.
vaildate.only_num_letter_symbol_tips: Only letters, numbers and symbols {symbol} are allowed

validate.not_allowed_only_spaces: Not allowed to use only spaces.
validate.only_allow_letter_num_start_tip: Only numbers or letters are allowed to start.
validate.only_letters_num_allowd_tips: Only letters and numbers are allowed.
